kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The msedgedriver version (126.0.2592.87) detected in PATH at C:\edgedriver\msedgedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected MicrosoftEdge version (127.0.2651.98); currently, msedgedriver 127.0.2651.98 is recommended for MicrosoftEdge 127.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
